Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack
- Receives an additional Ki +3 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For 1 turn from the character's entry turn*
- Damage reduction rate 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is another "Hybrid Saiyans" or "Bond of Parent and Child"
Category ally on the team*
- Ki +7 and ATK 250%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking
- All allies' ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} and chance of performing a critical hit
15%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)
*1 or more Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained*
- DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 38%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack
- ATK 200%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking
*12 or more INT Ki Spheres obtained, or 5 Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained*
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}DEF 258%{passiveImg:up_g} and damage reduction rate 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' ATK & DEF 58%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turns (self excluded)
*When another 2 or more "Hybrid Saiyans" Category allies are on the
team starting from the 3rd turn from the character's entry turn, or
starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle*
- Meets up with Super Saiyan Trunks (Kid) & Super Saiyan Goten (Kid)
and can perform Reversible Exchange

7806.superDescription:
Raises ATK for 4 turns, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and raises chance of performing 
a critical hit by 10% for 4 turns

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7807.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and raises chance of performing 
a critical hit by 58% for 1 turn

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Triple Kamehameha
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily, 
causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, all attacks become 
critical hits; changes all Ki Spheres 
to INT & Rainbow Ki Spheres
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there are another 
2 or more "Hybrid Saiyans" Category allies 
on the team starting from the 3rd turn from 
the character's entry turn, or starting from 
the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only, 
be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
